data.name: Turn back the clock： Hsinchu
data.description:
"Turn back the clock： Hsinchu" takes Hsinchu City, Taiwan as the main stage. Players can experience the historical time and space changes of Hsinchu while playing. The story will revolve around a historian and an agent of the Time and Space Security Agency. Players can alternately play the roles to be played according to the progress of the plot, and experience the same script from different perspectives as a starting point, through different perspectives. Encounter, correct, and repair historical events, experience conflict, cooperation, choice, and other plots, and finally work together to catch the mastermind and explore his motives.

The game is not limited to static observation and puzzle solving, but also has dynamic action elements for players to complete when encountering emergencies. The puzzle-solving theme is easy to use, but also in line with the historical era, fully demonstrating the humanistic history of Hsinchu, creating a very high sense of immersion in the era, and sometimes the player's choice will also affect the direction of the plot. In addition, the option of 360 view appreciation is also provided, and five scenic spots with on-site 4K high-resolution stereo shooting with VR 180/360 are waiting for players to have a glimpse of the actual appearance of Hsinchu City.

translations.long_description:
『逆光追竹』以臺灣新竹市為主舞台，玩家可以在遊玩的同時體驗新竹的歷史時空變化。故事將圍繞在一名歷史學者與一名時空維安局探員展開，玩家能依據劇情進度交替扮演要遊玩扮演的角色，從不同的角色視角作為出發點去體驗相同的劇本，透過不同的視角來遭遇、導正並修復歷史事件，經歷衝突、合作、抉擇等情節，最終攜手抓到幕後主謀並探詢其動機。

遊戲不侷限於靜態的觀察解謎，在遭遇緊急事件時亦有動態的動作要素待玩家去完成。解謎題材易於上手的同時也與歷史年代相符，充分彰顯新竹的人文歷史，營造出極高的年代沉浸感，有時候玩家的選擇也會影響劇情的走向。另外也提供了360環景鑑賞的選項，五個以VR 180/360 進行現地 4K 高解析的立體拍攝的景點，等著讓玩家能一窺新竹市的實際風貌。
translations.short_description: 『逆光追竹』以臺灣新竹市的歷史時空爲遊戲背景，故事圍繞在一名當代歷史學者與一名來自未來的時空維安局探員之間的共同冒險。玩家在劇情中，需交替扮演兩位主角，用雙視角的方式，在導正與修復歷史事件的過程中，逐步探究事件真相。
